techmeme.title: 1Password adds a feature to help find a login, password, or access code by adding a specific physical location to items in a new Nearby section of the app (Andrew Liszewski/The Verge)
Turing, which works with engineers to contribute code to AI projects, raised a $111M Series E led by Malaysia's sovereign wealth fund at a $2.2B valuation (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
A look at the Trump administration's strategy to transform its traditional press shop into a rapid-response influencer operation via memes, TikTok, and podcasts (Washington Post)
DuckDuckGo says AI answers are out of beta and now get info from across the web, not just Wikipedia; setting AI answers to "often" shows them ~20% of the time (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Kuo: Apple is developing an updated C1 modem chip for mass production in 2026 with mmWave support and improved power consumption and transmission speed (Tim Hardwick/MacRumors)
